p: The graphical output (showing results for the years 20–27) for the simulations over a period of 27 years, using the standard parameter values as shown in Tables 3– 5 are presented in Figs 3– 14. The graphical output for the Æ. mcintoshi population in zone 1, when this is the only vector and when there is no seasonal flooding of the plains in this zone is shown in Fig 15: the importance of the level of vertical transmission within the Ædes population is shown in the respective sub-figures of Fig 15. The seroprevalence levels in the human and cattle population at different years after the El Niño event of year 21 are shown in Table 6.
